title: Council Decision of 16 September 1996 appointing an alternate of the Advisory Committee on Nursing Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 16 September 1996 appointing an  alternate of the Advisory Committee on Nursing Training (96/C  290/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Ms Christa THEM is hereby appointed an alternate of the Advisory  Committee on Nursing Training in place of Ms Elisabeth PRIBERNIG for the remainder of the latter's  term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 September 1996.
For the Council The President I. YATES
(1) OJ No L 176, 15. 7. 1977, p. 11.
(2) OJ No C 221, 9. 8. 1994, p. 3.
(3) OJ No C 206, 11. 8. 1995, p. 2.
